content.rendered:
Overview

Eldeco Live By The Greens, located in Sports City at Sector-150, Noida is an expansive area designed to be a dream destination for the young generation. The city features numerous recreational sporting facilities enabling a healthy, active and purposeful life. Great location, modern facilities and amenities enveloped in abundant greenery fill your life with eclectic experiences. The Project will offer all modern world-class facilities to the residents and will make luxury affordable by offering 2/3 BHK homes with luxurious amenities. This development Eldeco Live by the Greens is located in the heart of the city and is well connected to Delhi NCR. Explore Eldeco Live by the Greens 2/3 BHK Flats at Sector 150 Noida this weekend. Come choose World of Opulence at right rates! Live the way you would in a resort. It has all been designed to give you a relaxed outlook.

2 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

3 BHK LUXURY APARTMENTS

HIGHLIGHTS

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH A RESORT-LIKE LIFESTYLE

Live the way you would in a resort. It has all been designed to give you a relaxed outlook.
  • Chill out on the poolside cabanas as you chat, read a book or simply work on your laptop
  • Swim a lap or two in the swimming pool and bask on the loungers
  • Grab a bite at the Café
  • Experience a sense of arrival at the well-appointed entrance lobby

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH WORLD-CLASS SPORTS FACILITIES

Be a sport for life with the sports facilities here; whatever be your preference, you have a choice.

  • Do a lot in the sprawling cricket field right in the middle of the complex*; show off your cricketing skills in a friendly match or play a spectator and cheer from the grass sloped seating and pavilion
  • Enjoy a quick round of badminton in the comforts of this indoor court
  • Sweat it out with a leisurely game of lawn tennis
  • Casually dribble and throw a hoop at the half basketball court

CHANGE TO HOMES WITH AN ACTIVE SOCIAL LIFE

Love to mingle? This is the place for you. Whether it’s about old friends coming over or making new ones in the neighborhood, your social life is sure to thrive here.

  • Meet and greet in style at the café
  • Stage a play with your kids’ theater group at the amphitheater
  • Chat with neighbors at sundown under a cabana
  • Celebrate your family occasions in the party hall

CHANGE TO HOMES WHERE THE KIDS HAVE FUN TOO

Anytime is fun-time here for the little ones. All their need for excitement and activities has been well taken care of.

  • Let them play all they want In the kids’ play areas within the kids-friendly complex.
  • Cheer them as they go up the rock climbing wall*
  • Watch over your toddler from a guardians’ seat as he plays in one of the multiple tot-lot areas
  • Check out the youngsters as they go for a spin at the skating rink*

FLOOR PLANS

LOCATION MAP

OPEN UP TO A GREAT LOCATION

  • It is the greenest sector of Noida with about 80 percent of green cover.
  • Shaheed Bhagat Singh Park, spread over 40 acres, the biggest in the country is at a walking distance.
  • The low-density of this sector means more open spaces per family.
  • Easily accessible location through 6-lane Noida-Greater Noida Expressway.
  • Location is near the upcoming FNG (Faridabad-Noida-Ghaziabad) Expressway.
  • Easy connectivity to rest of NCR via the Noida-Greater Noida Metro.
  • Best of schools like DPS, Amity, Apeejay, Lotus Valley, Pathway, Shriram Millennium, Step-by-Step are within 15 min drive.
  • There are many hospitals in close vicinity like Jaypee, Yatharth and Fortis.
  • The best of social infrastructure is nearby, like Sector-18 Market, DLF Mall of India, Great India Place, Great Venice Mall, World of Wonder, Water World, Lotus Greens Broadwalk (under development), Expocentre and more.
  • The upcoming Jewar Airport, located at 20 min drive, will be operational in the next 5 years*. Approaching from the new airport, Sector-150 would be amongst the first sectors in Noida

ABOUT ELDECO GROUP

Over the last 35 years, we have poured our collective energy, expertise and experience to build better living and working experiences for our customers. With a promise to offer quality projects across a spectrum of needs and budgets, Eldeco has earned the trust of thousands of people in 15 cities by delivering on its commitment. Every time.

Site Address :Eldeco Live by the Greens – SC-02/A9, Sector 150, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201310

B R O C H U R E   D O W N L O A D

Do you want to talk with one of our Real Estate Experts?

Call Now: +91 9565 699 699
